price: 25. Ir jie pasiliko savo Urve tris šimtus (saulės) metų, pridedant devynis (prie mėnulio metų).
arabic: وَلَبِثُواْ فِي كَهۡفِهِمۡ ثَلَٰثَ مِاْئَةٖ سِنِينَ وَٱزۡدَادُواْ تِسۡعٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walabithū fī kahfihim thalātha mi-atin sinīna wa-iz'dādū tis'ʿan
